page.title: 11INDUSTRY
page.content: SEVERAL SMALL-SCALE INDUSTRIAL SITES ARE TO BE FOUND IN THIS BLOCK. AT MARGROVE PARK A HAULAGE FIRM OCCUPIES SOME OF THE LAND AT MARGROVE PARK FARM. A SMALL ENGINEERING FIRM MAKES MODEL RAILWAYS AND AT THE CARAVAN SITE CARAVANS AND MOBILE HOME BUILDING IS UNDERTAKEN, AND A TRANSPORT DEPOT AND OFFICES. AT SLAPEWATH THERE IS A HEAVY GOODS VEHICLE FIRM BUYING AND SELLING TRUCKS. ANOTHER FIRM UNDERTAKES COMMERCIAL VEHICLE REPAIRS AND TANK SHOT BLASTING. AT CHARLTON THERE IS AN ANIMAL RECOVERY SERVICE AT THE FORMER MINE MANAGER'S HOUSE, PROVIDING A KNACKER SERVICE FOR THE AREA. ON BIRK BROW THE FILLING STATION AND GARAGE ALSO PROVIDES A VEHICLE RECOVERY SERVICE.
